disabled.label: disabled
disabled.title: When present, it specifies that the component should be disabled.

id.label: id
id.title: When present, it adds a custom id to the tooltip.

class.label: class
class.title: When present, it adds a custom class to the tooltip.

escape.label: escape
escape.title: By default the tooltip contents are not rendered as text. Set to false to support html tags in the content.

fit-content.label: fitContent
fit-content.title: Automatically adjusts the element position when there is not enough space on the selected position.

show-delay.label: showDelay
show-delay.title: When present, it adds a custom delay to the tooltip's display.

hide-delay.label: hideDelay
hide-delay.title: When present, it adds a custom delay to the tooltip's hiding.

auto-hide.label: autoHide
auto-hide.title: Whether to hide tooltip when hovering over tooltip content.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Uses to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

pt-options.label: ptOptions
pt-options.title: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.
